title: Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse)
description: Jeff Glucker of Hooniverse is our guest and we talk about plastidip, unicorn sweatshirts, Lamborghini Aventadors, Coachella, Airstream trailers, Chump Car, the Long Beach Grand Prix, and the VW Jetta Hybrid.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
